attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the police are unable to enforce existing laws to ensure safety and prevent public nuisance, ban the sale of fireworks to casual purchasers. All purchasers should be licensed and dispays limited to much narrower time windowsa
